trans-unit.source: Holds information relating to the change of execution status event for an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that raised the event.

Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that raised the event corresponding to the value when the event occurred.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that raised the event corresponding to the value when the event occurred.

Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that raised the event corresponding to the value when the event occurred.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that raised the event corresponding to the value when the event occurred.
Provides a <xref href="System.String"></xref> representing the current instance.
Contains the following strings in the order of description:
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> as an enumeration converted to string, of the originating <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult> as an enumeration converted to string, of the originating <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> representing the current instance.
